features.name: Mythic Ability
features.desc: At 1st rank and every odd mythic rank thereafter, select one new mythic ability.

features.name: Mythic Trick
features.desc: Mythic Tricksters can find creative uses for their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.desc:
If a character can catch an opponent when he is unable to defend himself effectively from her {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, she can strike a vital spot for extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
The character's attack deals extra damage anytime her target would be denied a {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (whether the target actually has a Dexterity bonus or not), or when the character {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanks{/g} her target. This extra damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} and increases by 1d6 at later levels. This additional damage is precision damage and is not multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}.
The character must be able to see the target well enough to pick out a vital spot and must be able to {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g} such a spot.

features.name: Sneaky Quack
features.desc:
If a character can catch an ally when they are unable to defend themselves effectively from her {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}, she can heal a vital spot for extra healing.
The character's heal heals extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} anytime her target would be denied a {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (whether the target actually has a Dexterity bonus or not), or when the character {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanks{/g} her target. This extra healing is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per die of your sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This additional healing is precision healing.

features.name: Mythic Feat
features.desc:
Mythic characters gain mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} every even mythic rank. These feats can be selected only as part of mythic advancement, not as part of a character's normal advancement or in place of any other bonus feat.
Most mythic feats require a non-mythic feat as a prerequisite. These mythic feats enhance the benefits of their prerequisite feats, making them truly awe-inspiring. If a character doesn't possess any of the necessary prerequisite feats when she gains a mythic feat, she can wait to select a mythic feat until the next time she gains a mythic rank or level.

features.name: Improved Mythic Trick
features.desc: Mythic Tricksters can find creative uses for their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.

features.name: Greater Mythic Trick
features.desc: Mythic Tricksters can find creative uses for their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
